instructions: Navigate to a website that offers a PWA , such as YouTube Music . From within the URL omnibar, there will be a new "+" icon on the right-hand side. Tap on this icon . Add YouTube Music PWA from Chromebook Source: Android Central After pressing the icon, click Install to confirm the installation of the PWA. Install YouTube Music PWA Confirmation Source: Android Central Once installed, the new PWA will automatically open.

Navigate to a website that offers a PWA , such as Twitter Lite . On the right-hand side of the Chrome window, click the three-dot overflow button . Open Menu to Install PWA Source: Android Central Select the install option. Install PWA option from menu Source: Android Central After pressing the icon, click Install to confirm the installation of the PWA. Confirm PWA Installation Source: Android Central

Open the Settings app on your Chromebook. Tap on Apps in the sidebar near the bottom. Select Apps section in Chromebook Settings Source: Android Central Click on manage your apps . Manage Apps on Chromebook Source: Android Central Tap the search bar, enter the name of the app, and select it. Next to the title, tap the Uninstall button. Uninstall app from Chromebook Source: Android Central Select Remove from the dialog box. Confirm App Removal Chromebook Source: Android Central
